mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANIME (ANIME_ID, ANIME_DESC, START_DATE, TOTAL_EPISODE, CURRENT_EPISODE, STUDIO, STUDIO_LINK, ANIME_SCORE, AGE_RATING) VALUES (#{ANIME_ID}, #{ANIME_DESC}, #{START_DATE}, #{TOTAL_EPISODE}, #{CURRENT_EPISODE}, #{STUDIO}, #{STUDIO_LINK}, #{ANIME_SCORE}, #{AGE_RATING})
mapper.select: SELECT ANIME_ID, ANIME_DESC, START_DATE, TOTAL_EPISODE, CURRENT_EPISODE, ANIME_SCORE, AGE_RATING, STUDIO, STUDIO_LINK FROM TBL_ANIME ORDER BY ANIME_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ANIME SET ANIME_DESC = #{ANIME_DESC}, START_DATE = #{START_DATE}, TOTAL_EPISODE = #{TOTAL_EPISODE}, CURRENT_EPISODE = #{CURRENT_EPISODE}, STUDIO = #{STUDIO}, STUDIO_LINK = #{STUDIO_LINK}, ANIME_SCORE = #{ANIME_SCORE}, AGE_RATING = #{AGE_RATING} WHERE ANIME_ID = #{ANIME_ID}
